      • getMap

        public String getMap(int zoom)
              throws IOException
        Method retrieves a map containing markers of all the cities that have been reached
        Parameters:
        zoom - Integer value that will be set from 1-8.
        Returns:
        String that contains the file path of the map
        Throws:
        IOException - Method uses IO to save image

      • refreshMap

        public void refreshMap()
        Method checks each location compared to the life distance and sets the location as achieved if the life distance is greater than the distance to the location.
